title: Hashed Timelock Contracts (HTLCs)
description: Manage your active HTLCs. Create new ones, redeem received HTLCs with the correct preimage, or extend the claim period for HTLCs you sent.
senderDesc: These are HTLCs where you locked funds for someone else to claim.
receiverDesc: These are HTLCs created by others that you can claim if you have the secret (preimage).
extendDialogDesc: Specify how many additional seconds to add to the claim period.
redeemDialogDesc: Enter the secret preimage to claim the funds.
